text: They are required to show why they should not be bound over for disturbing the peace and for inciting a breach of the peace. The summonses say they are "likely to persevere in such unlawful conduct." Lord Russell, 89, was putting his affairs in order, and packing a case, at his Chelsea home yesterday. His secretary, American-born Mr. Ralph Schoenman, said:
handwritten_text: They oe requireol ho show wly Hhey.
name: Ralph Schoenman
